sentences.sContent: It’s a six-month lease but it’s renewable.
sentences.sCn: 租期六个月，但是可以续签。

sentences.sContent: ...But renewable energy will have to displace fossil fuels to a much greater extent in the future to avoid unacceptable climate risks...
...Notwithstanding important recent progress in developing renewable fuel sources...
...the United Arab Emirates has endorsed an ambitious target to draw 24% of its primary energy consumption from renewable sources by 2021...
...Even major fossil fuel exporting countries have great potential to develop renewable energies...
...What are suggested as renewable and less-polluting energy alternatives...

synos.tran: 可再生的；可更新的；可继续的

words.tran: 更新，恢复；复兴；补充；革新；续借；重申

trans.tranOther: if an agreement or official document is renewable, you can make it continue for a further period of time after it ends
